alert.note: Alert for North Bay Interior Valleys (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Coastal Flood Advisory issued January 05 at 4:53AM PST until January 05 at 1:00PM PST by NWS Monterey
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 PM PST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor coastal flooding expected. * WHERE...North Bay Interior Valleys. * WHEN...From 6 AM to 1 PM PST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Flooding of lots, parks, and roads with only isolated road closures expected. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Combination of high tide this morning plus an additional 1 to 1.5 foot increase in water levels from the storm system may result in flooding of areas much along the lines of what happens during King Tide events.
info.instruction: If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property.
